com.esri.mo2.map.elt
Class TextElement

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.BaseElement
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.TextElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Data, Element, Identifiable, MapData, Spatial
public class TextElement
extends BaseElement

This class provides functions for drawing a text element.

print

public void print(Graphics2D g,
                  Rectangle rec,
                  float scale)
Prints this layout element using the bounding box info and graphics handle from a printer. The default implementation of this method calls print method. Most of the time, developers should override this method.

Specified by:
print in interface Element
Specified by:
print in class BaseElement
Parameters:
g - the java.awt.Graphics handle
rec - the bounding box where the layout element should be drawn
scale - the scaling factor to draw the text as symbol

Description copied from class: BaseElement
